constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: MVKTC Name: Motor Vehicle Restricted Area (KTC)
CONARA Name: Kingston Old Town Conservation Area
KEYACO Name: Kingston Old Town Conservation Area
KTCAAP Name: Kingston Town Centre AAP
KEYACH Name: Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
LBCASE LB Address: 13-15CHURCH STREET (west side)KINGSTONLB Grade: GD2LB Ref: 6/14

decision_conditions: The works hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent. Reason: As required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The materials and finishes of the development hereby permitted shall be those specified on the application form and approved drawings, or such other materials as shall have been approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority and shall thereafter be retained as such.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Any damage to the building caused by or during the course of the carrying out of the work permitted shall be made good within 3 months of the completion of the development, in accordance with a specification agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. Reason: To safeguard the character and appearance of the Listed Building in accordance with policy CS8 of the Core Strategy, development management policies DM10 and DM12 and policy 7.8 of the London Plan (2016).
description: Listed building application for fenestration alteration, repair and redecorate the roof, door, windows, external cast iron rainwater goods. Replacement of rear dormer casement window. Clean the gutter, outlets and repoint brickwork as required
